categories.name: Happy Hour
categories.tagline: The Longest Happy Hour In America Mon-Friday 12-7PM

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Topped with seasoned ground beef, warm queso sauce, and fresh pico de gallo. (Served as is—no modifications).

items.name: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Crispy chicken marinated in buttermilk, then fried golden brown. Served with a side of French fries and honey mustard.

items.name: Philly Cheesesteak Egg Rolls*
items.description: Three (3) egg rolls filled with Philly Cheesesteak. Served with chili sauce.

items.name: Veggie Spring Rolls
items.description: Five (5) spring rolls filled with vegetables, rolled, and fried.

items.name: Crab Cake*
items.description: Five (5) pieces of deep-fried crab balls drizzled with chipotle sauce.

items.name: Wings
items.description: (6) wings tossed in your choice of sauce: Sweet Chili, Buffalo, Old Bay, Honey Old Bay or Lemon Garlic. Choose Ranch or Blue Cheese. Served with a side of fries.

items.name: Vegan Cauliflower
items.description: A little spicy, immensely flavorful, and incredibly delicious. Crispy on the outside, tender in the middle. Served with a side of fries.

items.name: Spicy Bang Bang Chicken Tenders
items.description: Tossed in our sweet spicy chili sauce. Served with fries.

items.name: Spicy Bang Bang Shrimp*
items.description: (5) crunchy tempura shrimp tossed in our spicy sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Caesar Salad*
items.description: Classic Caesar salad with your choice of protein. Chicken: $16.99, Shrimp: $18.99, Salmon: $21.99.

items.name: Mountain Wings Platter
items.description: 18 wings with your choice of Sweet Chili, Buffalo, Lemon Garlic Parmesan, or chipotle sauce.

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Topped with seasoned ground beef, warm queso sauce, and fresh pico de gallo. (Served as is—no modifications).

items.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
items.description: A creamy blend of sautéed spinach, tender artichoke hearts, and melted cheeses, served warm with crispy tortilla chips.

items.name: Tibs*
items.description: Stir-fry steak, tomato, lettuce, onion, green pepper, Ethiopian butter, NebFoto sauce on a bed of your choice of basmati rice or penne pasta.

items.name: Grilled Shrimp*
items.description: Grilled shrimp with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choose a side: rice or mashed potatoes.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Breast
items.description: Grilled chicken with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choose a side: rice or mashed potatoes.

items.description: Grilled salmon with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choose a side: rice or mashed potatoes.

items.name: Glazed Salmon*
items.description: Glazed salmon with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choose a side: rice or mashed potatoes.

items.name: Fajitas
items.description: A sizzling medley of red peppers, red onions, and cherry tomatoes, served with rice. Shrimp – $17.99*, Beef – $16.99*, Chicken – $15.99, Veggie – $13.99.

items.name: Lamb Chops*
items.description: Lamb chops with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choose a side: rice or mashed potatoes.

items.name: Rib Eye Steak*
items.description: Generous 16 oz. cut, thick and juicy with sautéed bell pepper, onion, cherry tomato, and broccoli. Choice of rice, mashed potatoes, or french fries.

items.name: Friends Pasta
items.description: Penne with Alfredo, tomato, or pink sauce. Comes with garlic bread. Beef: $19.99*, Chicken: $22.99, Shrimp: $25.99*, Lamb Chops: $31.98*, Salmon: $29.99*.

items.name: Friends Stir Fry
items.description: Eggs, bell peppers, broccoli, and onion with your choice of protein mixed with basmati curry rice. Veggie: $15.99, Chicken: $17.99, Tibs: $19.99*, Shrimp: $21.99*.

items.name: Shawarma
items.description: Your choice of beef or chicken wrapped in a tortilla with tomato, lettuce, onion, and tahini sauce. Served with a side of French fries.

items.name: Friends Burger*
items.description: Tender and juicy beef with American cheese, smothered with spicy chipotle sauce. Served with a side of French fries and a pickle.

items.name: Vegan Burger
items.description: Plant-based burger with American cheese, homemade vegan sauce, tomato, and lettuce. Served with a side of French fries and a pickle.

items.name: @NebFoto's Tibs Panini
items.description: Stir-fry, tomato, lettuce, onion, green pepper, Ethiopian butter, cheddar cheese and NebFoto sauce on ciabatta bread. Served with a side of French fries. Chicken or Beef*: $17.50, Crab Cake: $19.99*, Shrimp: $21.99*.
